short_description: estuary quantity surveying is a surveying services company based in united kingdom.
long_description: providing quantity surveying, cost management and employers agent services to private and public sector clients, including commercial, offices, retail, hotels and leisure, education, residential, industrial and infrastructure sectors. we understand that not all clients needs are the same and aim to provide bespoke and tailored services and fees to meet these needs and their objectives. we also offer a quantity surveying / cost management support service to other cost consultants and property professionals, either office based and remotely, to enhance and work alongside existing resources or to provide short or long term support and expertise. effective cost planning, management and control is an integral and ongoing process from project inception to completion. we manage cost and financial risk whilst seeking to add value to the overall project rather than just merely reducing aspirations.

generated_description: estuaryqs, legally known as estuary quantity surveying ltd., based in leigh-on-sea, england, provides quantity surveying, cost management, and employer agent services to both private and public sector clients. the company serves a diverse range of sectors, including commercial, offices, retail, hotels, leisure, education, residential, industrial, and infrastructure. their services encompass cost consultancy, cost control and management, cost planning and estimating, procurement strategy, tender documentation preparation, and various financial reporting and valuation services. estuary quantity surveying ltd. also offers support to other cost consultants and property professionals, enhancing their resources and expertise.
